text: evarkal arivinri mutattanattal tankal kulantaikalaik kolai ceytarkalo avarkalum, evarkal allah (pucikkak) kotuttirunta (nalla)varrai (akatena) allahvin mitu poy kurit tatuttuk kontarkalo avarkalum niccayamaka nastamataintu vittarkal. Akave, avarkal nervali perravarkalaka irukkavillai; niccayamaka tiya valiyileye cenru vittanar
